entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning this morning and ending this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. POP 30%
